Thank you for replying so quickly!

The 503 was from Jetty. It's a clean ma=
chine: Win Server 2003 R2, without IIS. I've decided to follow your advice.=
 I've wiped the installation of 2.0 and today I'll try 1.14. 

Thanks again=
.
Willis
